channel.title: Project Server - Perfection at its Best
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i53.tinypic.com/j0jk2v.png[/img][/center]
[b]Intro:[/b] So, this is a server I've been developing privately for a while, basically to gain a better understand of java as I am going for a CPA degree in college. I have decided to host this server once it is complete, so stay tuned till then. I apologize for the bad choice of text color (made it for a different layout), I will change when I have a chance. [b]Blog:[/b] [url=http://projectserver.tumblr.com/]Project Server[/url]
[img]http://i53.tinypic.com/259cyl5.png[/img]
[ul][li]Game Engine [list][li]Original PI w/ all dupes patched + cleaned source Cycle-based event manager Almost no use of process (used only when necessary) Working shutdown hook + fixed x-log[/li][/list][/li][/ul]
[img]http://i52.tinypic.com/xo1njq.png[/img]
[ul][li]Melee [list][li]Perfect weapon timers Attack styles effect hits (One of the first servers to have this!) Every weapon with spec (items up to rev 477) Accurate max hits (killamess's formula + tweaked) [img]http://i52.tinypic.com/4vmo08.png[/img][/li][/list][/li]
[li]Range [list][li]Perfect max hit formulas (killamess + tweaked Uses a real range defense formula to determine Every bow with correct gfx and speed Every enchanted bolt with proper effect [img]http://i51.tinypic.com/350565t.png[/img] Chinchompa's + salamandar's Throwing axes, knives, darts with correct speeds Arrow dropping + ava accumulator has proper chances [img]http://i52.tinypic.com/29pp4y1.png[/img][/li][/list][/li]
[li]Magic [list][li]Perfect maxhit formula (Dixi normous + tweaked) All modern combat spells w/ proper effects All ancient combat spells w/ proper effects Perfect modern, ancient, and lunar teleporting Modern noncombat: Alchs, Superheat, B2p, Enchant (on all jewelry + bolts), Tele-other Lunar spells: Cure-other, Cure me, Heal-other, Heal me, Spec transfer, Veng other, Veng, Spellbook swap Rest of lunar: Monster examine, Stat spy, Humidify, Heal group, Cure group, Dream [img]http://i53.tinypic.com/b7dmrr.png[/img] [img]http://media.tumblr.com/tumblr_li2wk8niyk1qgqgqp.png[/img][/li][/list][/li]
[li]Misc [list][li]Completely Entity-based combat system Defense system based on equipment + skill level + prayer Clipped following for every combat type [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/](Vid)[/url] Dragonfire shield [img]http://i56.tinypic.com/be69mb.png[/img] Block emotes work on players and npc's Every set effect (Barrows, void, ect..)[/li][/list][/li][/ul]
[img]http://i55.tinypic.com/kbvy4g.png[/img]
[ul][li]Agility [list][li]Contains a library of methods to execute any agility event Holds an array of objects corresponding to correct action Gnome course and Wilderness course fully work[/li][/list][/li]
[li]Cooking [list][li]Every fish is cookable Every food is make-able (pizza, cake, ect..) Correct cook level, burn rate, burn-stop lvl Cooking over range = less chance to burn than cooking over a fire Cooking interface cook 1, cook 5, cook All, cook X work [img]http://i56.tinypic.com/28lasqu.png[/img][/li][/list][/li]
[li]Crafting [list][li][url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/](Vid-Old)[/url] Craft gems, rings, necklace, amulets, and bolts Crafting leather interface Crafting d leather + interface [img]http://i53.tinypic.com/33eo1ax.png[/img][/li][/list][/li]
[li]Firemaking [list][li][URL=http://"http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rK0xD0Z7SWo"](Vid - Updated)[/URL] Clipped firemaking + can't start ontop another fire or in bank Burning colored logs = colored fires Burning sequence Ashes appear when fire burns out "Backward lighting" [img]http://i1217.photobucket.com/albums/dd390/russiandude2/fm.gif[/img][/li][/list][/li]
[li]Fishing [list][li]Fishing formulas perfected Each fishing spot has working first and second option River troll random event Barbarian fishing [img]http://i53.tinypic.com/10nt0sj.png[/img][/li][/list][/li]
[li]Fletching [list][li]Fletch arrows, bows, and bolts Fletch interface 1, 5, all, x[/li][/list][/li]
[li]Herblore [list][li]Herb identifying Every potion from rs is make-able Potion mixing Poisoning weapons[/li][/list][/li]
[li]Mining [list][li]Prospecting works for every rock All rocks have correct respawn timers Rune ess + pure ess mining works Rock Golem random event [img]http://i1217.photobucket.com/albums/dd390/russiandude2/mine.gif[/img][/li][/list][/li]
[li]Prayer [list][li]Bone burying + altar sacrifice Normal prayer system (474) Ancient prayers (Not sure if server should have) Zombie random event [img]http://i53.tinypic.com/ab5co4.png[/img][/li][/list][/li]
[li]Runecrafting [list][li]Talisman locating + abyss access works Correct multiplier for every rune Rune ess makes regular runes, pure ess makes rest[/li][/list][/li]
[li]Thieving [list][li]Pickpocket every thieve-able npc + correct stun rate Thieve stalls + correct respawn timers (source: runewiki) Guards next to stalls can notice and attack you [img]http://i53.tinypic.com/2nvt3ef.png[/img][/li][/list][/li]
[li]Woodcutting [list][li]Every tree is chop-able Correct stumps + respawn timers for each tree Tree spirit random event fully working [COLOR=Red]Random chance to find a nest[/COLOR] [img]http://i1217.photobucket.com/albums/dd390/russiandude2/wc.gif[/img][/li][/list][/li]
[li]Other [list][li]Freaky forester + Evil chicken random event can appear while doing any skill All skills have same xp as real rs but are all multiplied by server xp rate Objects in skills such as woodcutting and mining update when you logout/change region (stumps stay, ect..)[/li][/list][/li][/ul]
[img]http://i51.tinypic.com/142ehjt.png[/img]
[ul][li]Dueling Arena [list][li][color=green]Every duel rule[/COLOR] [color=green]Cycle based countdown[/COLOR] [color=green]Unglitchable/undupable[/COLOR] [color=green]Rewards screen[/COLOR][/li][/list][/li]
[li]Castle Wars [list][li][url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/](Vid - Old)[/url] Interface for waiting + in-game Stealing flag + returning Working side doors + main doors Cave rocks mining + collapsing Barricades clipped + explosives working Earn tickets + reward interface Working catapults[/li][/list][/li]
[li]Fight Pits [list][li]Waiting and Playing interface Time based on how many players playing Correct rewards (based on how many players left) Tzhaar npc's spawn after a certain amount of time [img]http://i55.tinypic.com/2e3tx6x.jpg[/img][/li][/list][/li]
[li][COLOR=red]Fight Caves[/COLOR] [list][li][COLOR=Red]Coming soon[/COLOR][/li][/list][/li]
[li][COLOR=Red]Barrows[/COLOR] [list][li][COLOR=Red]Coming soon[/COLOR][/li][/list][/li][/ul]
[img]http://i54.tinypic.com/2nqunbn.png[/img]
[ul][li]Factions [list][li][color=green]Two sides able to attack eachother anywhere[/COLOR] [color=green]Cities spawn with their sides npc's[/COLOR] [color=green]Cities are conquerable and provide bonuses for owners[/COLOR] [IMG]http://media.tumblr.com/tumblr_limnugKJKN1qgqgqp.png[/img][/li][/list][/li]
[li]Npc Zones [list][li]4 zones (Desert, Jungle, Swamp, and Ice Mountain) Low, medium, and high level npc's in every zone specific to that type of zone A boss chamber in each zone, need a key obtainable from the zone monsters to get in [img]http://media.tumblr.com/tumblr_lhyk7qJy2u1qgqgqp.png[/img][/li][/list][/li][/ul]
[img]http://i55.tinypic.com/wl6uqh.png[/img] Sanity, Hayzie, and whoever made wL Galkon and Amg a bear for 477 (look-alike) Refractored client Graham, Killamess, Dixi normous, 2012, Scu11, Mr Chris for some methods I've used from their work

item.title: Project Server - Perfection at its Best
item.dc:creator: @Russian Russian
item.description:
@Russian wrote:

[center][/center]

Intro: So, this is a server I’ve been developing privately for a while, basically to gain a better understand of java as I am going for a CPA degree in college. I have decided to host this server once it is complete, so stay tuned till then. I apologize for the bad choice of text color (made it for a different layout), I will change when I have a chance.
Blog: Project Server

[ul][li]Game Engine
[list][li]Original PI w/ all dupes patched + cleaned source
Cycle-based event manager
Almost no use of process (used only when necessary)
Working shutdown hook + fixed x-log[/li][/list][/li][/ul]

[ul][li]Melee
[list][li]Perfect weapon timers
Attack styles effect hits (One of the first servers to have this!)
Every weapon with spec (items up to rev 477)
Accurate max hits (killamess’s formula + tweaked)
[/li][/list][/li]

[li]Range
[list][li]Perfect max hit formulas (killamess + tweaked
Uses a real range defense formula to determine
Every bow with correct gfx and speed
Every enchanted bolt with proper effect

Chinchompa’s + salamandar’s
Throwing axes, knives, darts with correct speeds
Arrow dropping + ava accumulator has proper chances
[/li][/list][/li]

[li]Magic
[list][li]Perfect maxhit formula (Dixi normous + tweaked)
All modern combat spells w/ proper effects
All ancient combat spells w/ proper effects
Perfect modern, ancient, and lunar teleporting
Modern noncombat: Alchs, Superheat, B2p, Enchant (on all jewelry + bolts), Tele-other
Lunar spells: Cure-other, Cure me, Heal-other, Heal me, Spec transfer, Veng other, Veng, Spellbook swap
Rest of lunar: Monster examine, Stat spy, Humidify, Heal group, Cure group, Dream

[/li][/list][/li]

[li]Misc
[list][li]Completely Entity-based combat system
Defense system based on equipment + skill level + prayer
Clipped following for every combat type url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/[/url]
Dragonfire shield

Block emotes work on players and npc’s
Every set effect (Barrows, void, ect…)[/li][/list][/li][/ul]

[ul][li]Agility
[list][li]Contains a library of methods to execute any agility event
Holds an array of objects corresponding to correct action
Gnome course and Wilderness course fully work[/li][/list][/li]

[li]Cooking
[list][li]Every fish is cookable
Every food is make-able (pizza, cake, ect…)
Correct cook level, burn rate, burn-stop lvl
Cooking over range = less chance to burn than cooking over a fire
Cooking interface cook 1, cook 5, cook All, cook X work
[/li][/list][/li]

[li]Crafting
[list][li]url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/[/url]
Craft gems, rings, necklace, amulets, and bolts
Crafting leather interface
Crafting d leather + interface
[/li][/list][/li]

[li]Firemaking
[list][li](Vid - Updated)
Clipped firemaking + can’t start ontop another fire or in bank
Burning colored logs = colored fires
Burning sequence
Ashes appear when fire burns out
“Backward lighting”
[/li][/list][/li]

[li]Fishing
[list][li]Fishing formulas perfected
Each fishing spot has working first and second option
River troll random event
Barbarian fishing
[/li][/list][/li]

[li]Fletching
[list][li]Fletch arrows, bows, and bolts
Fletch interface 1, 5, all, x[/li][/list][/li]

[li]Herblore
[list][li]Herb identifying
Every potion from rs is make-able
Potion mixing
Poisoning weapons[/li][/list][/li]

[li]Mining
[list][li]Prospecting works for every rock
All rocks have correct respawn timers
Rune ess + pure ess mining works
Rock Golem random event
[/li][/list][/li]

[li]Prayer
[list][li]Bone burying + altar sacrifice
Normal prayer system (474)
Ancient prayers (Not sure if server should have)
Zombie random event
[/li][/list][/li]

[li]Runecrafting
[list][li]Talisman locating + abyss access works
Correct multiplier for every rune
Rune ess makes regular runes, pure ess makes rest[/li][/list][/li]

[li]Thieving
[list][li]Pickpocket every thieve-able npc + correct stun rate
Thieve stalls + correct respawn timers (source: runewiki)
Guards next to stalls can notice and attack you
[/li][/list][/li]

[li]Woodcutting
[list][li]Every tree is chop-able
Correct stumps + respawn timers for each tree
Tree spirit random event fully working
[COLOR=Red]Random chance to find a nest[/COLOR]
[/li][/list][/li]

[li]Other
[list][li]Freaky forester + Evil chicken random event can appear while doing any skill
All skills have same xp as real rs but are all multiplied by server xp rate
Objects in skills such as woodcutting and mining update when you logout/change region (stumps stay, ect…)[/li][/list][/li][/ul]

[ul][li]Dueling Arena
[list][li][color=green]Every duel rule[/COLOR]
[color=green]Cycle based countdown[/COLOR]
[color=green]Unglitchable/undupable[/COLOR]
[color=green]Rewards screen[/COLOR][/li][/list][/li]

[li]Castle Wars
[list][li](Vid - Old)
Interface for waiting + in-game
Stealing flag + returning
Working side doors + main doors
Cave rocks mining + collapsing
Barricades clipped + explosives working
Earn tickets + reward interface
Working catapults[/li][/list][/li]

[li]Fight Pits
[list][li]Waiting and Playing interface
Time based on how many players playing
Correct rewards (based on how many players left)
Tzhaar npc’s spawn after a certain amount of time
[/li][/list][/li]

[li][COLOR=red]Fight Caves[/COLOR]
[list][li][COLOR=Red]Coming soon[/COLOR][/li][/list][/li]

[li][COLOR=Red]Barrows[/COLOR]
[list][li][COLOR=Red]Coming soon[/COLOR][/li][/list][/li][/ul]

[ul][li]Factions
[list][li][color=green]Two sides able to attack eachother anywhere[/COLOR]
[color=green]Cities spawn with their sides npc’s[/COLOR]
[color=green]Cities are conquerable and provide bonuses for owners[/COLOR]
[/li][/list][/li]

[li]Npc Zones
[list][li]4 zones (Desert, Jungle, Swamp, and Ice Mountain)
Low, medium, and high level npc’s in every zone specific to that type of zone
A boss chamber in each zone, need a key obtainable from the zone monsters to get in
[/li][/list][/li][/ul]


Sanity, Hayzie, and whoever made wL
Galkon and Amg a bear for 477 (look-alike) Refractored client
Graham, Killamess, Dixi normous, 2012, Scu11, Mr Chris for some methods I’ve used from their work

Read full topic
item.source: Project Server - Perfection at its Best
